title: ASHE ULT BUG IN URF?????
body:
While playing Ashe in urf i had a bug where my ult went on full normal cooldown

http://puu.sh/h3ka8.jpg

replies.body: I had this for Jinx, it's common for multiple champions apparently
Same thing happened to me as well! qqqq
Same thing happening to Karthus ult.

> [{quoted}](name=Vascilixe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7HGE4EmJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-06T14:08:56.212+0000)
>
> Same thing happening to Karthus ult.

That's not a great loss, in fact his ult on that mode should be normal cd anyway.
Yeah, same happened to me the other day. I think I was Ezreal when my W went on an 8-second cooldown.
